bug.short_desc: CellClick Event does not fire in IE8

long_desc.thetext:
Event Handler listening on "cellClick" Events are not called in InternetExplorer 8 (IE8). Tested on native IE8 on Win Vista and native IE11 in IE8 mode on Win7.
We discovered this while migrating one of our applications from qooxdoo 2.1.2 to 3.5.
This bug can be reproduced on a qx.ui.table.Table with attached "cellClick" listeners. The official widget browser for the current version (3.5) is also affected. Start InternetExplorer 8, go to http://demo.qooxdoo.org/current/widgetbrowser/ and select "Table". Clicking on any cell in the table has no effect.
Our application relies heavily on tables with selectable cells and IE8 needs to be supported, so this is a major blocker for our migration task.
Thanks in advance for any suggestions on this.
We are currently in the release testing phase of the 4.0 Release which already includes a bugfix. So you just have to wait some more until a fix will be available.
